titles.title: HP146 Jesus, friend of little children

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, friend of little children,
Be a friend to me;
Take my hand, and ever keep me
Close to thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach me how to grow in goodness
Daily as I grow;
Thou hast been a child, and surely
Thou dost know.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Never leave me nor forsake me,
Ever be my friend;
For I need thee from life's dawning
To its end.
